title: DeArt 2005 will be launched! (full programme inside)
content:
Second Moscow Design and Interactive Art Festival DeArt 2005 will be launched! (Opening: 7 november in BSHAD)

Our festival now under new very creative roof: British Higher School of Art and Design  
 [http://www.education.icograda.net/web/school.shtml?s=BRIT01](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018203946/http:/www.education.icograda.net/web/school.shtml?s=BRIT01 "http://www.education.icograda.net/web/school.shtml?s=BRIT01")  
 [http://knowdesign.ru/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018203946/http:/knowdesign.ru/ "http://knowdesign.ru/") (info about fest translated below)

Full programme of DeArtFest in Moscow:

November, 7th, Monday

16:00 Opening cermony. Press conference.  
Presentation of the catalogue.  
Opening of exhibitions  
(" Lettertypes from the Hague ", TypeArt, A.Kuznetsova, " Private life liveable natures "  
and presentation of their catalogues)  
19:00 Design-session - a concert, wine, dialogue of designers.

November, 8th, Tuesday

16:30 Lecture Ryan Frisk & Catelijne van Middelkoop  
18:00 Coffee-break  
18:30 Jury Gordon and Valery Golyzhenkov's ( [http://letterhead.ru/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018203946/http:/letterhead.ru/ "http://letterhead.ru/") ) Lecture  
" New words. Who, what, what for "  
20:00 Dmitry Tchernyshev's Lecture  
" Creative at presence of the customer/advice of the old potboiler "

November, 9th, Wednesday

15:00 Michael Tumelia's Author's seminar " Traditional animation and a computer: things in common "  
16:30 Ilya Ruderman's and founders of studio Underware Lecture ( [http://www.underware.nl](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018203946/http:/www.underware.nl/ "http://www.underware.nl") )  
18:00 Coffee-break  
18:30 Master-class: Ryan Frisk & Catelijne van Middelkoop (day 1-st)  
20:00 Sergey Pronin's Lecture-seminar  
" It is accessible about design, advertising and perception surrounding. 100 pictures and any complexities in understanding "

November, 10th, Thursday

13:00 Master-class Underware and Ruderman (day 1-st/part1)  
15:00 Vivian Del Rio: " Secrets successful Free Lance "  
16:30 Lecture the Lucas de Groot ( [http://www.lucasfonts.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018203946/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/ "http://www.lucasfonts.com/") )  
18:00 Coffee-break  
18:30 Master-class: Ryan Frisk & Catelijne van Middelkoop (day 2-nd)  
20:00 Olga Purtova's Seminar (Identity) " Development of a trade mark. In searches of the best decision "  
21:00 Master-class: Underware and Ruderman (day 1-st/part2)

November, 11th, Friday

13:00 Master-class Underware and Ruderman (day 2-nd/part1)  
15:00 EPSON  
16:30 Vladimir Yefimov's Lecture (ParaType) " History of font Biblica/ITC Weidemann/Goethe Text.  
Experience of adaptation of cyrillics "  
18:00 Coffee-break  
18:30 Master-class: Lucas de Groot ( [http://www.lucasfonts.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018203946/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/ "http://www.lucasfonts.com/") )  
20:00 Michael Aldashin's Lecture " As well as why I do cinema " (technological and genre motives)  
21:00 Master-class Underware and Ruderman (day 2-nd/part2)

On November, 12th, Saturday

13:30 Master-class Underware and Ruderman (day 3-rd/part1)  
15:00 Igor Lebedev's Lecture " History of a photo 1839-1880 "  
18:00 Coffee-break  
18:30 Master-class: Lucas de Groot ( [http://www.lucasfonts.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018203946/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/ "http://www.lucasfonts.com/") )  
20:00 Igor Lebedev " History of a picture album ", " History of a photo 1890-1910 "  
21:00 Master-class Underware and Ruderman (day 3-rd/part2)

November, 13th, Sunday

16:30 Igor Lebedev's Lecture " History of a photo 1920 - 1930 "  
18:00 Coffee-break  
18:30 Master-class: Lucas de Groot ( [http://www.lucasfonts.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018203946/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/ "http://www.lucasfonts.com/") )  
22:00 Closing of festival

Adress:  
 British Higher School of Art and Design  
 EMBANKMENT OF ACADEMICIAN TUPOLEV, 15/15  
 MOSCOW,  
 105120  
 Russian Federation

Contacts:

Viacheslav (Cheslav) Eroshenko  
 DeArt Festival Founder & Head of Organisation Comitee  
 E-mail: [de7ign@yandex.ru](mailto:de7ign@yandex.ru)

Vladimir Dobrovinski  
 DeArt Festival Coordinator  
 Design lecturer (basic typography) in BHSAD  
 ( [http://britishdesign.ru/programs/beginners/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018203946/http:/britishdesign.ru/programs/beginners/ "http://britishdesign.ru/programs/beginners/") )  
 E-mail: [deartfest@rambler.ru](mailto:deartfest@rambler.ru)

Sergey Dolgov  
 DeArt Fest & ADCR Coordinator  
 ADCR (Art Directors Club Russia)  
 [http://www.adcrussia.ru/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018203946/http:/www.adcrussia.ru/ "http://www.adcrussia.ru/")  
 E-mail: [soulskeeper@gmail.com](mailto:soulskeeper@gmail.com)
